objects.text:
✓ 7-Quart Capacity (Feeds 9+ People)
✓ Digital Countdown Control
✓ Travel-Proof Locking Lid
✓ Auto-Shift to Warm Mode

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and professional layout, ideal for showcasing a kitchen appliance product. The composition is built on a diagonal layered background using a combination of deep navy and soft steel-blue geometric shapes with subtle diagonal accent lines and semi-transparent circles, adding depth without distraction. The main product image is positioned centrally to the right, prominently displaying the appliance. Text layer "heading" introduces the brand in bold white uppercase, followed by "subheading" in soft blue for the product type. Benefits are listed in "description" using light gray text with checkmark bullets. Pricing in "price" is highlighted in bold orange to grab attention. A red rectangular CTA button background supports a white all-caps "cta" text. The design is structured, with a strong visual hierarchy directing focus from product name to description, price, and CTA.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#2E4053`
- Slate Blue: `#5D6D7E`
- Dark Steel: `#34495E`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Sky Blue: `#5DADE2`
- Light Blue-Gray: `#B3C6D1`
- Light Gray: `#E5E8E8`
- Soft Gold: `#F5B041`
- Bright Red: `#E74C3C`
product_color: The product image features a sleek Crock-Pot slow cooker with a modern, matte grey surface that evokes a sophisticated and minimalistic tone. The dominant color is a soft charcoal grey (#6B6B6B), used across the body and handles, creating uniformity and strength. Accents of light silver-gray (#D8D8D8) on the lid and control panel blend smoothly, adding contrast without overpowering. The display screen and buttons use a muted beige (#EFEFEF) for readability and warmth. The white brand logo (#FFFFFF) stands out against the darker background, drawing attention with clarity. This subtle yet elegant palette suits an advertisement campaign targeting modern, stylish kitchens.
